channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 10 Denver Companies That Are Great Places to Work
item.description: All of these companies based in the Denver metropolitan area made Inc.’s Best Workplaces list for 2025.

item.title: RFK Jr. and his new vaccine committee are obsessing over thimerosal, a preservative antivaxxers have falsely tied to autism despite zero evidence of causation
item.description: Some public health experts contend the thimerosal discussion will unnecessarily raise doubt in vaccines.

item.title: Meet Shubhanshu Shukla, Tibor Kapu, and Slawosz Uznanski-Wisniewski, the first astronauts from India, Hungary, and Poland to visit the International Space Station
item.description: Axiom Space, based in Houston, arranged the chartered flight, which was commanded by America’s most experienced astronaut, Peggy Whitson.

item.title: Small Businesses Are Slower to Adopt AI. Here’s Why
item.description: A new NFIB survey shows that typically innovative and responsive entrepreneurs lag behind bigger companies in using AI to improve their operations.

item.title: Nvidia stock price just hit another record: Hopes for a ‘golden wave’ of Gen AI adoption fuel fresh optimism

item.title: Pennsylvania House passes bill mandating cursive education in schools

item.title: Rewarding carbon-conscious consumers isn’t radical—it’s the future of banking
item.description: Smart banks will earn Gen Z loyalty by incorporating ESG signals into how customers are scored, segmented, and rewarded.

item.title: On Apple’s 20th Anniversary of Podcasting, the Company Is Celebrating With Its 20 Favorite Shows
item.description: Apple’s ’20 Years, 20 Podcasts We Love,’ celebrates an industry it helped nurture.

item.title: To Fall Asleep Faster, Science Says Just Do This for 5 Minutes
item.description: Worried about tomorrow? Pen and paper is all you need to fall asleep faster, and stay asleep.

item.title: Overrun With Disruptions? Here’s How to Stay Focused on What Matters While Running a Business
item.description: Disruptions can immediately throw your plans off track. Stick to your schedule with these tips.
